import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

x = [1, 2, 3, 4, 5]
y = [2, 4, 6, 8, 10]

plt.plot(x, y, label='Linear')
plt.xlabel('X axis')
plt.ylabel('Y axis')
plt.title('Line Plot')
plt.legend()
plt.show()

fig, axes = plt.subplots(2, 2, figsize=(10, 8))

axes[0, 0].plot(x, y)
axes[0, 1].bar(x, y)
axes[1, 0].scatter(x, y)
axes[1, 1].hist(y)

plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
